oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Noontime Neighbors - 1950-11-07 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: WSM's Noontime Neighbors, originally broadcast 1950-11-07, part 2. Hosted by John McDonald and Joe Allison, with Jimmie Selph, Billy Burkes, Owen Bradley and the Noontime Neighbor Band, with guest Woodrow Luttrell. Part 1: http://cmfdigitization.cmf.int:2011/cdm/ref/collection/musicaudio/id/462
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Billy Burkes; Owen Bradley; Noontime Neighbor Band
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: John McDonald hosts the quiz [continued from part 1] -- Joe Allison introduces Billy Burkes -- Goofus (Billy Burkes marimba) -- Weather report (Joe Allison) -- Let's All Sing Like The Birdies Sing (Owen Bradley and the Noontime Neighbor Band) -- John McDonald introduces Woodrow Luttrell -- Woodrow Luttrell talks -- Closing statement (John McDonald) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (Joe Allison)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); Noontime neighbors (Radio program); Bradley, Owen; Noontime Neighbor Band; Allison, Joe; Tennessee Farm Bureau; Burkes, Billy
